implementation.useCase: Using Claude to automatically generate high-quality metadata (primarily descriptions) for millions of user-uploaded documents across Scribd and SlideShare platforms to improve content discoverability
implementation.problem: Approximately 70% of user-uploaded content had low-quality or missing metadata, making it difficult for users to discover relevant material
implementation.integrationMethod: Not specifically mentioned, but involves large-scale inference processing

metrics.metric: increase in users who view content and ultimately sign up as subscribers
metrics.sourceText: We saw a 7% increase in the users who are viewing it that ultimately come to the site and then sign up and become subscribers.

metrics.metric: of user-uploaded content that previously lacked quality metadata and was addressed with Claude
metrics.sourceText: Helped address 70% of user-uploaded content that lacked quality metadata
Scaled to process over 100 million documents

qualitativeBenefits.detail: AI-generated descriptions provide more context about documents at first glance
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Having the content right there at first glance gives the user more context about the particular document versus having to read through the whole thing

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Similar improvements when incorporating descriptions into homepage recommendations
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: They've seen similar improvements when incorporating the descriptions into recommendations on their homepage, and are preparing to integrate them into search results.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Creators no longer need to manually add metadata to their content
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: When a creator uploads a document to Scribd or a deck to SlideShare, they've already done the work of creating the content. Attaching metadata like titles, descriptions, or categories is extra work for them.

outcomes.roi: Not specifically mentioned, though the 7% increase in subscriber conversion suggests positive ROI

technicalDetails.promptEngineering: The team conducted testing of language capabilities and summarization abilities, and evaluated different prompts during experimentation phase
technicalDetails.challenges: Evaluating the quality of models and prompts during experimentation; scaling to handle large volumes of content
technicalDetails.solutions: Conducted extensive human-led evaluations with content operations department; selected Claude for its ability to perform large volume inference in short time
technicalDetails.scale: Processing over 100 million documents across Scribd and SlideShare platforms
